p: El-Abadelah et al. reported a synthesis of a set of 2-arylbenzimidazoles 36 bearing both piperazine and fluorine. Their synthesis was based on mimicking the value of incorporating both fluorine and piperazine in ciprofloxacin in order to achieve a broad antimicrobial activity. The in vitro evaluation against E. coli. S. aureus, A. parasiticus and C. albicans showed no significant antibacterial activity at concentrations ≤100 μM [ 143].
